subsections.title: Questions
subsections.content: Answer these questions about basic chemistry.
points:
What are the building blocks of matter? 
Options: Atoms, Molecules, Cells, Elements
Answer: Atoms

Which subatomic particle has a positive charge? 
Options: Electron, Neutron, Proton, Photon
Answer: Proton

subsections.title: Questions
subsections.content: Answer these questions on chemical reactions.
points:
What are substances called before a chemical reaction? 
Options: Reactants, Products, Catalysts, Elements
Answer: Reactants

Which law states that mass is neither created nor destroyed in a reaction? 
Options: Law of Conservation of Mass, Newtonâ€™s First Law, Law of Gravity, Law of Thermodynamics
Answer: Law of Conservation of Mass

subsections.title: Questions
subsections.content: Answer these questions on physics fundamentals.
points:
Who formulated the laws of motion? 
Options: Albert Einstein, Isaac Newton, Galileo Galilei, Nikola Tesla
Answer: Isaac Newton

What is the unit of force? 
Options: Newton, Joule, Watt, Pascal
Answer: Newton
